Wi-Fi
• Network (SSID): {wifi_ssid}
• Password: {wifi_password}
Tips
• If slow: toggle Wi-Fi or move closer to the router.
• If it drops: power the router OFF 10s → ON; wait 2–3 min.
Need help? Call {host_phone}.

Check-in (from {checkin_time})
• Building: code 7171 + key symbol (or round key).
• Apartment: long square-ended key; pull door gently TOWARDS you, turn counter-clockwise.
• If stuck: lift handle slightly and retry.
Need help? Call {host_phone}.

Check-out (by {checkout_time})
• Leave keys on the table.
• Switch OFF AC, lights, hot plate.
• Close windows/doors; take out full trash.
Thank you! For issues: {host_phone}.

Water
• Cold water is drinkable.
• Hot water should be available.
Do NOT touch: {boiler_warning}
No hot water?
1) Run the tap 30–60s.
2) Check boiler light is ON.
3) Wait 2–3 min and retry.
Still no hot water? Call {plumber_phone} or {host_phone}.

Appliances & Terrace
• AC: set 23–24°C; turn OFF when leaving.
• TV: if “No Signal”, check input/HDMI and power.
• Hot plate: never leave pots unattended; switch OFF after use.
• Umbrella: tie to railing; ALWAYS close when away (wind risk).
• Plants: you may water daily (except cacti).

Lights
• Kitchen: switch on the right side of the stairs (facing kitchen).
• Terrace: switch inside, on the right before the terrace door.

Trash & Recycling
• Use courtyard bins.
• Separate glass, plastic/metal, paper (see signs).
• General waste: daily.
Please do not leave trash on the terrace.

Transport
• Metro: Cavour (Line B) ≈ 5 min walk.
• Buses: Via Cavour (e.g., 75/117/84) to center.
• Tickets: Tabacchi/edicolà or ATAC app; validate on board.

Airports
• FCO: Leonardo Express → Termini → Metro B to Cavour (1 stop) or 12–15 min walk.
• CIA: shuttle bus → Termini → Metro B to Cavour.
• Taxis: fixed airport fares (use official white taxis).

Where to eat (nearby)
• La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali – classic Roman (+39 06 679 8643)
• Ai Tre Scalini – wine bar & small plates (+39 06 4890 7495)
• Blackmarket Hall – cocktails
• La Barrique – cozy wine bar

What to visit (walkable)
• Colosseum ≈10 min; Roman Forum ≈12 min.
• San Pietro in Vincoli (Michelangelo’s Moses).
Hidden gems
• Santa Prassede mosaics; Scalinata dei Borgia.
• Underground of San Martino ai Monti (guided).

Useful numbers
• Emergency (EU): 112
• Police: 113 | Ambulance: 118 | Fire: 115
• Taxi: 06 3570 | City info: 06 0606
Host: {host_phone}
